attributes.action: commence a national non-chemical strategy to control the wasp population in urban and populated areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Wasps play an important role in the natural world, however their presence in large numbers in areas of dense human population is less significant. Any potential benefit from these insects is outweighed by the pain, fear and distress that they cause, particularly for young or vulnerable people.

This petition calls on the Prime Minister to initiate a national programme to control and substantially reduce the wasp population, particularly in urban centres and areas of significant human activity.

This petition also recommends the use of natural and non-chemical solutions.
